backend/main.mo: Implements a simple cooldown system using a map of last action times to rate-limit device actions.
feature_evidence.json: Contains a feature evidence report referencing placement of a generated hero image asset and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Maps frontend file paths to short descriptions of their purpose within the application.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive CSS variables for theming in light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: App entry HTML defining metadata, font preloads, and mounting point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with root layout and routes for home, privacy, and terms pages.
frontend/src/components/common/ImageWith: React image component that shows a gradient placeholder and handles load errors gracefully.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying company info, links, social icons, and a WhatsApp button with backend rate‑limit checks.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navbar.ts: Responsive navbar with smooth section scrolling, mobile sheet navigation, and brand navigation behavior.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper containing navbar, routed content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section describing MagadhPrime’s production quality and natural processing values.
frontend/src/components/sections/Benefit: Benefits grid highlighting organic wheat, added bran, no chemicals, and hygienic production.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with background image, product intro, and a WhatsApp order button with rate-limit checking.
frontend/src/components/sections/Support: Support form handling validation, rate-limit checks, and Google Forms submission with success and error states.
frontend/src/components/sections/VisualT: Displays a responsive grid of production‑related images using generated asset URLs.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhatsAp: CTA section prompting users to order via WhatsApp with rate‑limit protected link opening.
frontend/src/config/marketing.ts: Centralized marketing config including WhatsApp link generation, contact info, social links, address, and Google Forms field IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Simple hook that updates the document title and meta description.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining custom CSS variables and utility classes for theming, gradients, WhatsApp colors, and success states.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Provides helpers to build normalized asset URLs, including generated asset paths.
frontend/src/lib/deviceId.ts: Generates and stores a persistent device UUID in localStorage with a fallback for older browsers.
frontend/src/lib/googleFormsSubmit.ts: Submits contact data to a configured Google Form using POST with no‑cors mode.
frontend/src/lib/rateLimit.ts: Checks frontend action rate limits via backend using a device ID and fails closed on errors.
frontend/src/lib/scrollToSection.ts: Smoothly scrolls to a page section with an offset for a sticky header.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage sections and handles hash‑based smooth scrolling with updated page metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Displays the privacy policy content and sets page metadata.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfUsePage.tsx: Displays the terms of use content and sets page metadata.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, requirements, design notes, and existing features for the marketing site.
